answers.answer: With chronicity of hep C, this can lead towards liver cirrhosis which is what you suggested by the fibrosis and fatty liver picture - presumably ultrasound(?). Diabetes type II can also be attributed to creating fatty liver type picture. However with advanced liver disease, glucose regulation is definitely impaired. If hepatitis is indeed the primary cause for the liver disease, then it is likely that the liver disease is what has caused you to become diabetic as well.Hope that helps
